title: Insecure FTP Server
description: Explore an FTP server with insecure configurations
hints: Check the FTP server configurations for anonymous access.
Try connecting as an anonymous user - what directories can you list?
Look for world-readable files that might contain the flag.
learningObjectives: Understand FTP configuration and its security implications
Learn how anonymous FTP access can lead to data leakage
Practice navigating FTP services using command-line tools
